node.text:
Finding the perfect place to get hitched is a rather daunting task for to be weds. If you are looking for a beach destination that can infuse culture, sophistication and some flair into your nuptials, then The Raviz Kovalam is the answer you are looking for. Just decide on your big day, give us your specifications and leave the rest to us.

For bookings contact: 0471 – 3051234, 1800-4252-2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com, reservations@theraviz.com
